statements: SELECT * FROM historical_trades ORDER BY trade_date DESC, trade_time ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT trade_symbol, trade_volume FROM historical_trades WHERE trade_price > 100 ORDER BY trade_price DESC
SELECT trade_id, trade_symbol, trade_volume FROM historical_trades WHERE trade_volume >= 1000 AND trade_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT trade_date, trade_time, trade_symbol, trade_price FROM historical_trades WHERE trade_price < 50 AND trade_volume < 500 ORDER BY trade_date ASC, trade_time ASC
SELECT AVG(trade_price) AS average_price FROM historical_trades WHERE trade_symbol = 'AAPL'
SELECT trade_symbol, trade_volume, trade_price FROM historical_trades WHERE trade_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM historical_trades WHERE trade_volume > 1000 ORDER BY trade_date DESC;
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, trade_symbol, trade_volume, trade_price FROM historical_trades WHERE trade_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY trade_volume DESC, trade_time ASC;
SELECT trade_symbol, SUM(trade_volume) AS total_volume FROM historical_trades GROUP BY trade_symbol HAVING total_volume > 5000 ORDER BY total_volume DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT trade_date FROM historical_trades WHERE trade_price < 100 ORDER BY trade_date;
SELECT * FROM historical_trades WHERE trade_id = 1001
SELECT trade_date, trade_type, trade_volume FROM historical_trades WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL'
SELECT pattern_id, pattern_name, description FROM trade_patterns WHERE pattern_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5
SELECT * FROM historical_trades ORDER BY trade_date DESC
SELECT pattern_name, trade_frequency FROM trade_patterns WHERE pattern_name LIKE '%Trend%' LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM historical_trades WHERE trade_type = 'Buy' ORDER BY trade_id DESC;
SELECT trade_date, stock_symbol, trade_volume FROM historical_trades WHERE trade_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, stock_symbol, trade_volume FROM historical_trades WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL' AND trade_volume > 10000 ORDER BY trade_date ASC;
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, stock_symbol, trade_volume FROM historical_trades WHERE trade_date < '2022-10-01' AND trade_type = 'Sell' ORDER BY trade_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT pattern_name, description, trade_strategy FROM trade_patterns WHERE trade_frequency = 'Weekly';
SELECT * FROM trades ORDER BY trade_date DESC;
SELECT trade_id, stock_symbol, trade_price FROM trades WHERE trade_type = 'BUY';
SELECT AVG(trade_price) AS avg_price FROM trades;
SELECT trade_id, trade_type, trade_volume FROM trades WHERE trade_price > 100 ORDER BY trade_date ASC;
SELECT stock_symbol, COUNT(*) AS num_trades FROM trades GROUP BY stock_symbol ORDER BY num_trades DESC, stock_symbol ASC;
SELECT * FROM trades WHERE trade_price > 1000 ORDER BY trade_date DESC, trade_volume ASC;
SELECT trade_id, stock_symbol, trade_date FROM trades WHERE trade_type = 'Buy' OR trade_type = 'Sell' ORDER BY trade_date DESC;
SELECT trade_id, trade_price FROM trades WHERE trade_volume > 1000 AND stock_symbol = 'AAPL' AND trade_type = 'Buy';
SELECT trade_date, SUM(trade_price) AS total_trade_value FROM trades GROUP BY trade_date HAVING total_trade_value > 5000 ORDER BY trade_date DESC;
SELECT trade_id, trade_price, trade_volume, tp.partner_name FROM trades t JOIN trade_partners tp ON t.trade_id = tp.partner_id ORDER BY trade_date ASC, trade_volume DESC;
SELECT * FROM trades;
SELECT trade_id, stock_symbol, trade_type, trade_volume, trade_price, trade_date FROM trades WHERE trade_type = 'Buy';
SELECT stock_symbol, last_price, high_price, low_price, market_cap FROM stock_prices ORDER BY last_price DESC;
SELECT trader_name, trader_location FROM traders WHERE trader_location = 'New York' ORDER BY trader_name ASC;
SELECT trade_id, analysis_date, trend, conclusion FROM trade_analysis WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM trades WHERE trade_price > 1000 ORDER BY trade_date DESC;
SELECT trade_id, stock_symbol, trade_volume FROM trades WHERE trade_type='Buy' ORDER BY trade_price ASC;
SELECT stock_symbol, last_price, high_price FROM stock_prices WHERE market_cap > 1000000 ORDER BY last_price DESC;
SELECT trader_name, trader_location FROM traders WHERE trader_location='New York' ORDER BY trader_name ASC;
SELECT analysis_id, trade_id, trend, conclusion FROM trade_analysis WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM trades;
SELECT symbol, price, volume FROM trades WHERE price > 100;
SELECT trade_date, symbol, volume FROM trades ORDER BY trade_date DESC;
SELECT partner_name, country FROM trade_partners WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT category_name FROM trade_categories WHERE category_id BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT * FROM trades WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY trade_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT symbol, price, volume FROM trades WHERE trade_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT trade_id, symbol, price FROM trades WHERE volume > 1000 AND symbol LIKE 'AAPL%' ORDER BY trade_date ASC;
SELECT t.symbol, t.price, tp.partner_name FROM trades t INNER JOIN trade_partners tp ON t.trade_id = tp.partner_id WHERE t.volume > 5000;
SELECT * FROM trade_locations WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -70 ORDER BY location_name ASC;
